column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////JINYA is always busy! It's hard to get a table here most times but they do have a variety of options. However
column2: I think their best ramen is their vegan ramen. The other ramens are often over complicated and don't taste that amazing. They often have special ramens as well
column3: but in all honesty not my favorite ramen place. I do have to shout out the Japanese curry and their fried Brussel sprouts both of those dishes are fantastic!
